name: Pimberman
description:
Pimberman is an endless challenging game, where you "kick" down ice blocks to score points, and move your way to the top of the leaderboard. 

Pimberman is out to prove to be the best ice block kicker, even amongst the enemy snow monsters and dangerous icicles falling down with each kick. 

FEATURES:

* Use the "space" key to kick and the "Left/right" arrow keys to switch sides

* Fish powerup to become invincible for a short time

* Global leaderboards to compete your score against others.

Have fun with the endless challenge, and as always thank you for your support.
